casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Robert K. STEWART 274P15-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Robert K. Stewart, for Stewart, Robert K. Amy Kunstling Irene, Special Deputy Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. Maureen Krueger, District Attorney.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 25th of June 2018 by Defendant for Reconsideration:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
